title: kaNNAre kaNDenacyutana
sahitya:
kaNNAre kaNDenacyutana kanci puNtakOTi karirAja varadana


caraNam 1    vara maNi mukuTa mastakana sarva sura sanakAdi vandita pAdayugana 
taruNi lakSmI manOharana pItAmbara duDugeyali ranjipa vigrahana
    caraNam 2    kastUri tilaka nosalana tOra muttina hAra padaka bhUSaNana 
ettidA bhaya hastadavana tanna bhaktara stutige hAraisi higguvana
    caraNam 3    nIla mEgha shyAmala bAla lOla makara kuNDala dharisihana 
mUlOkadoLage cennigana umA lOlaja vandya vaikuNTha vallabhana
    caraNam 4    bhAnu kOTi tEjadavana bhava knana rAshige havya vAhanana 
dAna varadeya dallaNana muni mAnasa hamsanendenisi kombavana
    caraNam 5    tunga caturbhujadavana shubha mangaLa rEke angAlaloppuvana 
shrngAra hAra kandharana dEva gangeya pita purandara viTTalana
